column5: I was at the Talbot river on Sunday and the walleye have not come up the river yet.  I was wondering if anyone has heard anything in the past couple days.  Seems they are really late this year.
I will be up that way maybe Friday. I will check out the dam and let you know. BTW no perch in yet either....as of yesterday.
I ended up checking it out again and turns out they are there now.  Some nice big ones too if anyones interested.  I'll be getting some pics and posting them soon.
